results.title: Effects of metformin on acute respiratory distress syndrome in preclinical studies: a systematic review and meta-analysis
results.text_hl: ... Conclusion: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ inhibited @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011014 @@@pulmonary inflammation@@@ and oxidative stress and improved experimental @DISEASE_Lung_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D055370 @@@lung injury@@@ and survival rates in animal models of @DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@ARDS@@@.

results.title: Metformin Use before Influenza Vaccination May Lower the Risks of Influenza and Related Complications
results.text_hl: Our previous study revealed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use was associated with a lower risk of hospitalization for @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011014 @@@pneumonia@@@.
